name: inferno-overdrive--physical
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user breathes a stream of intense fire toward the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies depending on the original move.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user breathes a stream of intense fire toward the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies depending on the original move.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user breathes a stream of intense fire toward the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies depending on the original move.
